alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 12:39PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier, northwestern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 115 PM EST... At 1239 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Charleston Park to 6 miles west of Naples Park. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Labelle, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Port La Belle, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Naples Park, Felda, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Ortona, Muse, and North Naples. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County
